title: Multi-functional syringol based epoxides and properties of their thermoset polymers
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00320A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Melissa Sanchez, Peter C. Ford, Mahdi M. Abu-Omar
Lignin-based syringol monomer, 2,6-dimethoxypropylphenol (DMPP), can be upgraded through two synthetic routes to multi-functional propylpyrogallol DMPPO and tri-epoxide which allows for various polymer applications.
